subject: Hockey, Ice
Sex Crimes
Coaches and Managers
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: The former junior hockey coach and convicted sex offender Graham James pleaded guilty Wednesday to sexual assaults involving two of his former players, including the former N.H.L. star Theoren Fleury.
snippet: The former junior hockey coach and convicted sex offender Graham James pleaded guilty Wednesday to sexual assaults involving two of his former players, including the former N.H.L. star Theoren Fleury.
